name: The Moon Is Crying Monsters
description:
Submission for the Nokia Game Jam 2021.

Use arrow keys for all controls - walk, interact, advance dialogue, battle, etc.

----

I attempted to make a micro RPG with music, battles and an interesting story. I kind of got the battles working well, but the story and overall exploration is extremely lacking due to time constraints. 

I hope to be able to work on this game more to realize my original vision for it. As for now, I would consider this a very basic demo of what I had in mind.
